description:
The group discovers the Tower and the Rampart of Babylon. Touya also completes the usual registration with their administrators, Noel and Liora. Meanwhile, there`s sudden news from the Kingdom of Belfast that Queen Yuel has given birth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Birth of a Prince and with My Smartphone
Die Geburt eines Prinzen und zusammen mit meinem Smartphone
Naissance du prince et toujours avec mon smartphone.
Ouji Tanjou, Soshite Smartphone to Tomo ni.
王子誕生, そしてスマートフォンとともに.
